articles.title: How to Watch: Bryson DeChambeau on Friday at Professional Long Drive Association competition - pgatour.com
articles.description: Bryson DeChambeau advanced to Friday's final day at the Professional Long Drivers of America World Championships in Mesquite, Nevada.
articles.content:
Bryson DeChambeau advanced to Friday's final day at the Professional Long Drivers of America World Championships in Mesquite, Nevada. 
DeChambeau finished fourth in his 16-man group with 575 points … [+588 chars]

articles.title: Burna Boy drops “Want It All” featuring Polo G - P.M. News
articles.description: Grammy award-winner Damini Ogulu popularly known as Burna Boy releases a new single “Want Ot All” featuring American rapper Polo G.
articles.content:
Grammy award-winning Nigerian artiste, Damini Ogulu popularly known as Burna Boy has released a new single Want it All featuring American rapper Polo G.
